page.title: 12 INDUSTRY
page.content: {Ceffyl y Mor, (The Sea Horse) Factory, opened in 1979, manufactures tweed and silk which supplies the British and overseas markets.There are 6 employees but it is hoped to expand. It started in Llandysul due to the area's links with spinning and weaving. The{Romance Factory}makes wedding dresses and page boy outfits. Set up in 1965 because of available workforce it now employs 15 women. The products go abroad and to British shops. They sell garments at their own factory shop, or can supply to order. {Boat building.}One man has been building boats for 7 years. He makes 6 to 7 boats a year. He has 2 employees. Dutch Plywood and European larch, cut in Hull, are the main materials. He makes racing, sailing and fishing boats for British and foreign customers.
